articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: US consumer sentiment plunges over tariff and inflation fears - CNN
articles.description: Inflation is picking up again and President Donald Trump said this week it’s all his predecessor’s fault. But no matter who Trump blames for inflation, America’s economic mood is now souring — and Trump is getting the heat for it.
